citations.narrative:
The licensee's facility is still vacant and the store sign has been removed. Licensees must notify Animal Care at least 90
days in advance of any substantial changes to their operation, including a change in location or address. The licensee
needs to contact Animal Care to report their status and update their plans regarding their USDA license.
Inspection could not be conducted. Facility is vacant. Licensee contacted via phone and instructions given to contact
office for further guidance.
